card.name: Pretty Children
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures that cost 4 or more get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and your opponent's creatures that have "speed attacker" or "mach fighter" are put tapped.

card.name: Dorphadillom, Holy Demon Concatenated King
card.text: ■ EX Life ■ Speed Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, destroy all your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast non-multicolored spells.

card.name: Disnomenon
card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ■ Speed Attacker ■ Justdiver ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, look at the top card of your deck and add it to your hand or put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Hyakume-4, Spirit Treasure
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature or your opponent chooses this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. ■ Sasagale
